metadata.title: CVE-2017-2816 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the tag parsingfunctionality of LibOFX 0.9.11. A specially crafted OFX file can cause awrite out of bounds resulting in a buffer overflow on the stack. Anattacker can construct a malicious OFX file to trigger this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libofx7 - 1:0.9.12-1
ofx - 1:0.9.12-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libofx package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.9.12-1').
